mapper.select: SELECT trip.trip_name tripName, trip_note.trip_note_no tripNoteNo, (trip_note.trip_note_end_date - trip_note.trip_note_start_date + 1) as day, (trip_note.trip_note_end_date - trip_note.trip_note_start_date) as night FROM trip, trip_note WHERE trip.trip_no = trip_note.trip_no AND trip_note.users_id = #{value}
DELETE from trip_note WHERE trip_no = #{noteNo} and users_id = #{id}
